name: Modern recipes and cooking advice
details: A recipe is a formula of ingredients and a list of instructions for creating prepared foods. It is used to control quality, quantity, and food costs in a foodservice operation.

name: Recipe Advice - How To Cooking Tips
details: The best way to ensure that you have what you need to complete the recipe is to measure out all the ingredients before you start to mix them together.

name: Easy Cooking Tips and How-Tos
details: Every guide like this starts out with the same advice to control quality, quantity, and food costs in a foodservice operation.
